About

I have a passion for making things, when I get passionate about an idea I make it. I have been making websites since I was 13 and learned that I could make one. I am almost done with my B.S. in Management Information Systems and have been working in the field of Web Development since 2012. I have a background in Graphic Design and have a passion for good design and code. I also love being with my wife, music, cycling, and learning new things.
